"Transaction speed" doesn't matter. What matters is time to transaction finality, when the transaction becomes irreversible.  Credit card and bank transactions can take 60-180 days.  Bitcoin is ~10 minutes.  ETH/XRP/USDC never reach finality, they can always be reversed.
